articles.title: China’s consumer price growth weakens ahead of Communist party economic meeting - Financial Times
articles.description: Factory deflation eases but Beijing’s reliance on exports and industrial output is stoking trade tensions
articles.content: Chinas consumer price growth slowed in June while factory prices eased but remained in deflationary territory, prompting hopes for stronger efforts to spur the economy at an important Communist party… [+3068 chars]

articles.author: Noel Randewich, Lisa Mattackal
articles.title: S&P 500 and Nasdaq notch record highs as Nvidia gains - Reuters
articles.description: The S&P 500 and Nasdaq notched record-high closes on Tuesday, fueled by gains in Nvidia after U.S. Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell told lawmakers that more "good" economic data would strengthen the case for rate cuts.
